DOC.brief_summary: This study measure impact treatment Viagra depressive symptom quality life men erectile dysfunction untreated depressive symptom meet DSM-IV criterion dysthymia depression otherwise specify ( NOS ) , include minor depressive symptom exclude form psychotic disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Measuring The Impact Of Treatment With Viagra On The Depressive Symptoms Of Men With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Men age majority ED ( SHIM score less 21 ) Beck Depression Inventory II score 14 28 Subjects symptoms mania major depressive disorder demonstrate Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) Subjects require treatment antipsychotic , mood stabilizer , antidepressant agent lithium ( concomitant use benzodiazepine allow ) require treatment medication within past 3 month
